title: Remember the Lord in Prosperity
summary: Deuteronomy 8 reminds Israel of God's provision during their wilderness journey and warns them not to forget Him when they prosper in the land. They are to remember that it is God who gives them the ability to produce wealth.

faq.question: Why did God let Israel go hungry and then feed them with manna?
faq.answer: To teach them that man does not live on bread alone, but on every word from God.

faq.question: What warning does Moses give about prosperity?
faq.answer: Do not become proud and forget the Lord who gave you everything.
